sense.gloss: passing (an exam), pass, success, passing grade
meeting (specifications, standards, etc.), passing (inspection), qualification, being found eligible

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑真剣↑↓しんけん↓に↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓すれば↑試験↑↓しけん↓に↑合格↑↓|ごうかく|↓する↑期待↑↓きたい↓がもてる。
sdata.e: If you study earnestly, you can expect to pass the exam.

sdata.e: You have only to study hard, and you will pass the test.

sdata.e: Education shouldn't be aimed at passing a test.

sdata.e: Some of my classmates passed the examination, but the others didn't.

sdata.e: If you had studied harder, you would have passed the examination.
